title: Art of Coloring: Disney Animals: 100 Images to Inspire Creativity and Relaxation
description: Part of the Art of Coloring series, which has sold over 2 million copies across the U.S.Whether a skilled artist or an everyday dabbler of drawings and doodles, fans of all ages will enjoy these stunning pen-and-ink illustrations of beautiful landscapes, elaborate patterns, and memorable characters from Disneyâ€™s hit animated feature films themed to cute and cuddly animals.Collect the entire Art of Coloring series!
author: Walt Disney Company
